name: GoodsServicesTaxHarmonizedSalesTaxRegistrationNumber
definition: concatenation of an entity's business number, the 'RT' abbreviation and a 4-digit subaccount number used for reporting GST/HST
label: Goods and Services Tax / Harmonized Sales Tax registration number
explanatoryNote: An organization may have more than one GST/HST account through its subunits, this is handled through additional 4-digit subaccount numbers. This is used as both an account and an identifier for the registration.

name: BusinessNumber
definition: unique, 9-digit number that is the standard identifier for legal entities in Canada which are typically a business
label: business number

name: RegisteredCharityProgramNumber
definition: concatenation of an entity's business number, the 'RR' abbreviation and a 4-digit subaccount number used for registered charity contribution
label: registered charity program number
explanatoryNote: An organization may have more than one registered charity account through its subunits, this is handled through additional 4-digit subaccount numbers. This is used as both an account and an identifier for the registration.

name: PayrollDeductionsProgramNumber
explanatoryNote: An organization may have more than one deduction account through its subunits, this is handled through additional 4-digit subaccount numbers. This is used as both an account and an identifier for the registration.
label: payroll deductions program number
definition: concatenation of an entity's business number, the 'RP' abbreviation and a 4-digit subaccount number used for reporting payroll deductions

name: CorporationIncomeTaxNumber
label: corporation income tax number
explanatoryNote: An organization may have more than one tax account through its subunits, this is handled through additional 4-digit subaccount numbers. This is used as both an account and an identifier for the registration.
definition: concatenation of an entity's business number, the 'RC' abbreviation and a 4-digit subaccount number used for reporting corporate income tax

name: ImportExportProgramNumber
definition: concatenation of an entity's business number, the 'RM' abbreviation and a 4-digit subaccount number used for customs and import/export reporting purposes
explanatoryNote: An organization may have more than one import-exports account through its subunits, this is handled through additional 4-digit subaccount numbers. This is used as both an account and an identifier for the registration.
label: import export program number

name: InformationReturnsProgramNumber
label: information return program number
definition: concatenation of an entity's business number, the 'RZ' abbreviation and a 4-digit subaccount number used for information returns
explanatoryNote: An organization may have more than one information returns program number through its subunits, this is handled through additional 4-digit subaccount numbers. This is used as both an account and an identifier for the registration. As opposed to other program numbers, this number is used for filing information returns and not as an account.

name: BankOfCanada
definition: central bank of Canada
label: Banque du Canada
explanatoryNote:
The Bank of Canada's overall goal is to promote a stable and efficient financial system in Canada. The focus on the financial system as a whole parallels the Bank's approach to monetary policy, which focuses on the entire economy.
 
 The Bank provides liquidity to the financial system, gives policy advice to the federal government on the design and development of the system, oversees major clearing and settlement systems, and provides banking services to these systems and their participants.

name: CanadaRevenueAgency
definition: taxation authority of the Government of Canada
label: Agence du revenu du Canada
explanatoryNote: This agency administers tax laws for the Canadian government and for several of the provinces and territories of Canada.

name: CanadianBankingRegulatoryAgencyAndCentralBank
definition: regulatory agency, registration authority and central banking role of the Bank of Canada
label: Canadian banking regulatory agency, registration authority and central bank role of the Bank of Canada
